content: worry worms are a part of the random acts of crochet kindess movement by the facebook group of the same name see the link below worry worms are left out in the wild for some lucky person to find and take home most often there is a poem attached letting them know the worry worm s purpose https //www facebook com/share/g/1b7brc4cp4/ mibextid=wwxifr the original worry worm pattern had a crocheted disc for the face and then you had to either embroider the eyes or glue on those funny wiggly eyes well i m way too lazy for all that so one day i was deep in a pinterest hole and came across a bunch of cute creatures crocheted using those googly eyed finger puppets and…lightbulb worry worm finger puppets a great way to put a dent in your stash and spread a little crochet joy i haven t included a little poem because i just usually just give them away as i finish them but you can do a quick search on google or pinterest and find a plethora to choose from
